attributes.action: Establish 24-hour Covid-19 vaccination centres as quickly as possible.
attributes.additional_details:
The government's failure to establish urgently needed 24-hour vaccination centres because of a "lack of public demand" is bizarre, and almost certainly wrong.

This petition should only be signed by those who would be prepared to receive a vaccination at any hour of day or night, and will thus act as a demonstration to the government that their assumption was false.
attributes.background: The sooner we can vaccinate as many people as possible, the better. It's not rocket science.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
